title: Private interface methods
summary: Extract shared logic in interfaces using private methods.
explanation: Java 9 allows private methods in interfaces, enabling you to share code between default methods without exposing implementation details to implementing classes.

whyModernWins.title: Code reuse
whyModernWins.desc: Share logic between default methods without duplication.

whyModernWins.title: Encapsulation
whyModernWins.desc: Implementation details stay hidden from implementing classes.

whyModernWins.title: DRY interfaces
whyModernWins.desc: No more copy-paste between default methods.
